flash.tools.debugger

Interface SuspendReason


  • public interface SuspendReason
    Reasons for which the Flash Player will suspend itself

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int Breakpoint
      We hit a breakpoint
      static int Fault
      A fault occurred
      static int HaltOpcode 
      static int ScriptLoaded
      Either a new SWF was loaded, or else one or more scripts (ABCs) from an existing SWF were loaded.
      static int Step
      A step completed
      static int StopRequest 
      static int Unknown 
      static int Watch
      A watchpoint was triggered
